item.title: How to Make Your Own Marshmallow Root Tea for Throat Relief
item.description: Discover the shamanic wisdom and scientific insights behind making marshmallow root tea, a time-honored remedy for soothing sore throats and respiratory issues.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: Harnessing the Power of Burdock Root for Detoxifying Herbal Tea
item.description: Discover the ancient practice of using burdock root to create a detoxifying herbal tea. Learn the steps, benefits, and best practices for integrating this powerful plant medicine into your wellness routine.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: Making a DIY Lavender and Chamomile Sleep Aid Tea
item.description: Discover the ancient wisdom and modern science behind creating a soothing Lavender and Chamomile Sleep Aid Tea to enhance your nightly repose.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)
